Question & Options:
What sacrifice does Princess Yue make in relation to the Moon Spirit?
Options:
A. She captures the Moon Spirit
B. She helps Iroh escape
C. She gives her life to revive the Moon Spirit
D. She battles Zhao for control
Correct Answer: She gives her life to revive the Moon Spirit

Question & Options:
What sacrifice does Princess Yue make to restore the Moon Spirit?
Options:
A. She offers her waterbending abilities
B. She gives her life
C. She captures Zhao
D. She pleads with Iroh
